Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee protection claim based on lack of state protection

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the Board err in its treatment of evidence concerning state protection?
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Judicial review of Refugee Protection Division decision
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: Applicants failed to demonstrate lack of state protection

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee protection claim due to kidnapping and intimidation

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Applicants' failure to report incidents to authorities
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Judicial review of Refugee Protection Division decision
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Applicants did not report key incidents or seek help from alternate agencies
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Subjective reluctance does not rebut presumption of state protection

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee protection claim following involvement in armed robbery case
Crimes.Victim_Status: Applicants exposed to risks due to criminal retaliation
